## Source: ossf-package-analysis (a9af4bb0451549784551651c28cdaaa58ba61dff221c8c9b2dced0075f92a10f)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@assurantlabs/home-device-inventory' @ 999.100.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
